title: Something weird happened while updating
body: When I opened league client and it started updating, out of nowhere my MalwareBytes blocked a ransomware and LoL client stopped working immediately. I tried relunching LoL but it wont let me update or anything. Not sure how it landed there. Now I reinstalled lol and it works.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me. Guess I'll reinstall :(

I am so glad to see that this has happened to someone else in the recent update. Once I downloaded the update I tried launching the game as well, just like you had, and it also crashed and wouldn't reopen. Immediately after my MalwareBytes also found Ransomware and quarantined it. I had assumed that I could have downloaded the previous day but this could be Riot's fault depending on how many people have it.

it happened to me too.

Also Malwarebytes

EU West.
Had the same thing happen today, un-installed and re-installed and everything is working fine. {{champion:222}}
Same happened to me. Just about to reinstall and test it out now.

You may want to go back to your antivirus and allow league as an exception.  When league updates, it's replacing game files with new ones and your program might be detecting it as a threat.  Update your antivirus definitions as well to be sure.  Hope that helps!
